message: why do people say that fortnite is toxic, there literally isnt any proximity chat or ingame text chat or any of that, league of legends is 100x more toxic generally
reason: The message discusses the toxicity of Fortnite compared to League of Legends. It acknowledges that Fortnite does not have proximity chat or in-game text chat, which are common features in online games that can contribute to toxic behavior. The message also states that League of Legends is generally more toxic, implying that Fortnite is not as toxic in comparison. Therefore, the message can be classified as 'clean'.
label: toxic
